name: Robot Leech Therapy
description:
Robot Leech Therapy was created for the 2017 Butterscotch Shenanijam. The theme for this entry was "[Ep74] Electric Leech".

All artwork and gameplay programming was done by @armikorhonen. The background music is "Bossa Moment" from playonloop.com and the typeface used was "Riffic Free Bold" by InkyType.
